entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update version of IdentityModel to >= 7.4.0 for 9.x #54518
  • AddOidcAuthentication Logout Not Sending State Query Parameter When Deployed #54515
  • State is not preserved after login in .net 8.02 #54514
  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries, plainTextWithFilter #54512
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #54511
  • Nesting Counter Control inside html paragraph tags causes malformed component exception #54510
  • CORS: Headers are not set after client has been redirected from http to https #54509
  • Enhance null safety and compiler warnings for EventCallback<T> #54502
  • AspNetCoreModuleV2 report App_Offline.htm #54501
  • Keyed services fail to dependency inject into middleware #54500
  • Quarantine NavMenuHighlightsCurrentLocation #54497
    9.0-preview5
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24160.1] The ServicePointManager does not support proxies with the https scheme will pop up when using PeachPied.WordPress.AspNetCore package. #54495
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54494
  • Add a ResponseCompression action filter #54493
    Backlog

Closed

  • .NET 8 Blazor - Cannot Set CloseOnAuthenticationExpiration With Global Interactive Rendering / InteractiveServerRenderMode #54296
  • JWT Token Validation Fails after Upgrade from .NET 6 to .NET 8 #54321
  • Avoid the evaluation of policies if authentication not succeeded #54329
  • [OpenIdConnect] ability to specify a different certificate at runtime, based on scope service #54356
  • Dynamically updating AuthentionSchemes on AuthorizationPolicies #54412
  • When using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate my dotnetcore api will not start when hosted in Azure App Services #54386
  • Bug or Error: Bearer error="invalid_token" #54513
  • .NET 8 Blazor (Server with new template) - Issue with WS-Federation ChallengeAsync throwing a runtime exception #54305
  • Blazor SSR: Partially invalid UI Refresh after submitting EditForm #54432
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, single_query #54471
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #54474
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, json #54472
  • UseExceptionHandler does not work with PublishAot #53764
  • Feature request: ViewComponent bind attributes to public properties #54396
  • How I can implement distributed session using redis in a blazor web app? #54477
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #54480

PullRequests

Created

  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection
  • Remove KeyManagementOptions copy constructor #54516
    area-dataprotection
  • add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #54508
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • add readme package for NuGet package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #54504
    area-mvc
  • Add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer #54492
    community-contribution, area-security

Merged

  • Quarantine NavMenuHighlightsCurrentLocation #54498
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview3
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #54507
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.4
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #54506
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.18
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #54505
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.29
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24161.2 #54483
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview3
  • Use the VMR commit hash in .version #54461
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview3
  • Backport to net8 - Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54413
    Servicing-approved, feature-caching, 8.0.4
  • backport 8.0 - http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54437
    Servicing-approved, feature-httpsys, 8.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.29

Updated

  • Improve usage of `Type.GetType` when activating types in data protection #54256
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Improve route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure
  • Install java via native tools in CI #54421
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Un-retry BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #54450
    area-infrastructure
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Match arguments and property names in UserLoginInfo #54298
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
